chat.content:
A: Type
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
============================
forall c : code, unique_prefix c -> not_null c -> forall (m1 m2 head : list bool) (a : A), find_val (head ++ m1) c = Some a -> decode_aux c head (m1 ++ m2) = a :: decode_aux c nil m2

Related definitions and lemmas:
Some : ?A -> option ?A where ?A : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
find_val = fix find_val (a : list bool) (l : code) {struct l} : option A := match l with | nil => None | (b, c) :: l1 => if list_eq_dec eq_bool_dec a c then Some b else find_val a l1 end : list bool -> code -> option A Arguments find_val _%list_scope
nil : list ?A where ?A : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
unique_prefix = fun l : code => (forall (a1 a2 : A) (lb1 lb2 : list bool), In (a1, lb1) l -> In (a2, lb2) l -> is_prefix lb1 lb2 -> a1 = a2) /\ unique_key l : code -> Prop
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
code = list (A * list bool) : Type
not_null = fun c : code => forall a : A, ~ In (a, nil) c : code -> Prop
decode_aux = fix decode_aux (c : code) (head m : list bool) {struct m} : list A := match m with | nil => match find_val head c with | Some a => a :: nil | None => nil end | a :: m1 => match find_val head c with | Some a1 => a1 :: decode_aux c (a :: nil) m1 | None => decode_aux c (head ++ a :: nil) m1 end end : code -> list bool -> list bool -> list A Arguments decode_aux _ (_ _)%list_scope
hd_error : forall A : Type, list A -> option A
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
unique_prefix_not_null : forall (c : code) (a b : A), a <> b -> in_alphabet (a :: b :: nil) c -> unique_prefix c -> not_null c
not_null_find_val : forall c : code, not_null c -> find_val nil c = None
find_val_correct2 : forall (c : code) (a : A) (l : list bool), unique_prefix c -> In (a, l) c -> find_val l c = Some a
find_val_correct1 : forall (c : code) (a : A) (l : list bool), find_val l c = Some a -> In (a, l) c

encode = fix encode (c : code) (m : list A) {struct m} : list bool := match m with | nil => nil | a :: b => find_code a c ++ encode c b end : code -> list A -> list bool Arguments encode _ _%list_scope
ulist_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall l : list A, {ulist l} + {~ ulist l}
encode_app : forall (l1 l2 : list A) (c : code), encode c (l1 ++ l2) = encode c l1 ++ encode c l2
EnvRing.Pc : ?C -> EnvRing.Pol ?C where ?C : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
in_alphabet_nil : forall c : code, in_alphabet nil c
app_inv_app2 : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list A) (a b : A), l1 ++ l2 = l3 ++ a :: b :: l4 -> (exists l5 : list A, l1 = l3 ++ a :: b :: l5) \/ (exists l5 : list A, l2 = l5 ++ a :: b :: l4) \/ l1 = l3 ++ a :: nil /\ l2 = b :: l4
unique_prefix1 : forall (c : code) (a1 a2 : A) (lb1 lb2 : list bool), unique_prefix c -> In (a1, lb1) c -> In (a2, lb2) c -> is_prefix lb1 lb2 -> a1 = a2
sign_spec : forall (C : Type) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (get_sign : C -> option C), sign_theory copp ceqb get_sign -> forall c c' : C, get_sign c = Some c' -> ceqb c (copp c') = true
eq_bool_dec : forall a b : bool, {a = b} + {a <> b}
unique_prefix_inv : forall (c : code) (a : A) (l : list bool), unique_prefix ((a, l) :: c) -> unique_prefix c
in_alphabet = fun (m : list A) (c : code) => forall a : A, In a m -> exists l : list bool, In (a, l) c : list A -> code -> Prop Arguments in_alphabet _%list_scope
find_code = fix find_code (a : A) (l : code) {struct l} : list bool := match l with | nil => nil | (b, c) :: l1 => if eqA_dec a b then c else find_code a l1 end : A -> code -> list bool
Record sign_theory (C : Type) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (get_sign : C -> option C) : Prop := mksign_th { sign_spec : forall c c' : C, get_sign c = Some c' -> ceqb c (copp c') = true } Arguments sign_theory [C]%type_scope (_ _ _)%function_scope Arguments mksign_th [C]%type_scope (_ _ _ _)%function_scope
app_eq_unit : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a : A), x ++ y = a :: nil -> x = nil /\ y = a :: nil \/ x = a :: nil /\ y = nil
nth_error_split : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat) (a : A), nth_error l n = Some a -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ a :: l2 /\ length l1 = n
app_cons_not_nil : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a : A), nil <> x ++ a :: y

```   
intros c H_unique_prefix H_not_null m1 m2 head a H_find_val.
unfold find_val in H_find_val.
destruct head; simpl in H_find_val.
- injection H_find_val. intros; subst. reflexivity.
- destruct (find_val (head ++ m1) c) eqn:find_val_head.
  + injection H_find_val. intros; subst. apply f_equal.
    apply (decode_aux c (head ++ [b]) m2). rewrite <- app_assoc. reflexivity.
  + apply (decode_aux c (head ++ [a]) m2).
    rewrite <- app_assoc. reflexivity.
Qed
```

original: intros c H_unique_prefix H_not_null m1 m2 head a H_find_val. unfold find_val in H_find_val. destruct head; simpl in H_find_val. - injection H_find_val. intros; subst. reflexivity. - destruct (find_val (head ++ m1) c) eqn:find_val_head. + injection H_find_val. intros; subst. apply f_equal.
